song.title: Christ is Enough
song.lyrics:
[V1] .Em C G D/F# Christ is my reward and all of my devotion . Em C Now there's nothing in this world . G D/F# That could ever satisfy
[P1] . C D Em Through every trial, my soul will sing . D/F# C Em D No turning back, I've been set free
[C] .G Christ is enough for me .Em D Christ is enough for me .C D Em Everything I need is in You .C D Everything I need
[B1] . G I have decided to follow Jesus . C D No turning back, no turning back . G I have decided to follow Jesus . C D G No turning back, no turning back . Em C D Em The cross before me, the world behind me . C Em D No turning back, no turning back . Em C D Em The cross before me, the world behind me . C D G No turning back, no turning back --- [V2] .Em C G D/F# Christ my all in all, my joy and my salvation . Em C And this hope will never fail . G D/F# Heaven is our home
[P2] . C D Em Through every storm, my soul will sing . D/F# C Em D Jesus is here, to God be the glory
[B2] . Em C D Em I have decided to follow Jesus . C Em D No turning back, no turning back . Em C D Em I have decided to follow Jesus . C D G No turning back, no turning back .G I have decided to follow Jesus . C Em D No turning back, no turning back . G I have decided to follow Jesus . C D G No turning back, no turning back
